settings.question: How do I know if your menu delivers energy and strength?
settings.answer:
We invite you to unlock the Power Within and embark on a transformative journey with our amazing nutrient-dense meals to discover firsthand the boundless energy and strength they provide. The secret lies in the experience:

1. Monitor and Unleash:
Feel the surge of vitality by tracking your energy levels before and after indulging in our carefully crafted meals. Witness the immediate impact as your body absorbs the rich blend of vitamins, minerals, fiber, and protein, leaving you revitalized and ready to conquer the day.

2. Fuel Your Fitness:
For fitness enthusiasts, maximize your potential by enjoying our meals 3-4 hours before hitting the gym. Observe the remarkable difference in your energy and performance levels, as our nutrient-packed offerings become your ultimate ally in achieving fitness goals. Elevate your workout experience and surpass your limits with every delicious bite.

HeartyCajun is not just a meal—it's a powerhouse of nourishment, designed to unleash the energy and strength you need to thrive. Embrace the difference, savor the journey, and let the vitality within you flourish. Your path to lasting energy and strength begins with every bite of HeartyCajun!

settings.question: Do I choose my own meals?
settings.answer: Yes! You choose what you want to eat from our menu with the option to change them every week.

settings.question: Do you offer family portions?
settings.answer: Yes, absolutely! All of our Signature pastas come with a Family Tray option. At the meal selection menu, simply choose the "Family Tray" option and we will deliver in a single tray for your family or team to enjoy.

settings.question: Is there any cooking involved?
settings.answer: We do all of the cooking and you do all of the enjoying. Simply reheat and enjoy. Most meals are heated for up to 2 minutes and time could vary depending on microwave oven power.

settings.question: What kind of meals do you offer?
settings.answer: We specialize in nutrient-dense Italian Cajun meals. Our menu has no fluff items. Each dish is carefully crafted to deliver healthy nutrients that will keep you energized and strong.

settings.question: How soon can I get my first order?
settings.answer:
Your first order is delivered to you as soon as 4 days after it is placed. We deliver each day of the week except for Sundays.

After your first order, you will receive a box every week! You can always modify your order before your cutoff time - this includes meal selections, plan size, billing, and shipping information.

For Mondays and Tuesdays deliveries, the cutoff time is Wednesday 11:59PM EST of the previous week. For all other deliveries(Wednesday through Saturday), the cutoff time will be Sunday by 11:59PM EST.

settings.question: How do I view the menu without signing up?
settings.answer: You can easily view our menu without providing any personal information! On a desktop or laptop, simply click, “OUR MENU”, at the top of our homepage. On a mobile device, click on the dropdown menu at the top of the page(3 horizontal lines), and click on “OUR MENU.”

settings.question: Are meals fresh or frozen?
settings.answer: Guaranteed fresh. Meals are delivered fresh and never frozen. Once meals are received they should be placed in the fridge and refrigerated immediately. We do not recommend freezing our meals. Once in the fridge, they will last for at least 7 days.

settings.question: How do I apply a promo or coupon code during checkout?
settings.answer: When you get started at the signup page, you can enter a promo code in the section that asks adfafaf . You can input the promo code at checkout.

settings.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
settings.answer:
Yes, you can! We make it easy for you to manage your subscription so if for any reason you need to take a break from our delicious nutrient-rich meals or you decide that HeartyCajun is not for you, all you need to do is log into your account and you can cancel your subscription there.

Do keep in mind that while you can cancel at any time, canceling your subscription does not cancel existing orders that have already been processed and paid for. All future orders after the cancellation will cease and you will not incur further charges or receive future deliveries from HeartyCajun.

settings.question: How much does HeartyCajun cost?
settings.answer:
We offer 7 different plan sizes of nutrient-dense and delicious Italian Cajun meals delivered to you each week.

  • 6 meals = $12.65 per meal 
  • 8 meals = $12.48 per meal
  • 10 meals = $12.38 per meal
  • 12 meals = $11.90 per meal 
  • 16 meals = $11.82 per meal
  • 20 meals = $11.77 per meal
  • 24 meals = $11.41 per meal


We keep your costs low and offer free shipping with every Delivery!

settings.question: Is HeartyCajun sustainable and environmentally friendly?
settings.answer: Yes, we certainly are! In addition to sourcing organic and natural foods and utilizing sustainable packing, we have achieved 0% food waste on our Cajun pastas and 0.5 to 1% overall food waste.

settings.question: Editing my order
settings.answer:
Each week you will have the option to keep the meals from the previous week or edit meal selection to new favorites anytime before your weekly cutoff(For Mondays and Tuesdays deliveries, the cutoff time is Wednesday 11:59PM EST of the previous week. For all other deliveries(Wednesday through Saturday), the cutoff time will be Sunday by 11:59PM EST).

On Web (Desktop and Mobile Device):
*Log Into your account.
*Click on 
*Click 'Edit Meals.'
Adding Meals: Click on 'Add To Your Box' next to any meal you'd like to include in your order.
Increase/decrease Quantity: Click the ‘+’ to increase the quantity and click “-” to remove a meal from your or reduce the quantity.
Once you are done selecting your meals, click on 'Save.'
You'll be taken to the Add-Ons page. Choose any add-ons you'd like and click ‘Save Add-Ons’ or click 'Skip Add-Ons' to save and confirm your order.

settings.answer:

settings.question: Is your packaging recyclable?
settings.answer:
Yes! Here’s how to recycle and dispose of packaging materials:

Boxes: The simplest method is to break down the box and place curbside with your recycling.

Insulation: We use the best insulation to keep your food fresh for optimal quality. Take the insulated box liner to a recycling drop-off bin located at participating grocery and retail stores nationwide. Visit earth911.com to locate the store nearest to you.

Gel packs - The gel packs are non-toxic and reusable! They are drain-friendly which makes them easily disposable in any household drain without clogging. So you can dispose of them by draining it into the sink.

Food Containers: Our food containers are made with annually renewable plants, are allergen free, and 100% compostable. 

We have put great effort into sourcing packaging that is not wasteful. If your town doesn’t recycle certain materials or if you are interested in other options, please check out Earth911.com for a list of recycling facilities in your area.

settings.question: How long do my meals last?
settings.answer: Your meals will remain fresh for 7 days in the fridge until your next delivery arrives.

settings.question: How do I safely handle the gel packs?
settings.answer: The gel packs are non-toxic and reusable! They are drain-friendly which makes them easily disposable in any household drain without clogging. So you can dispose of them by draining it into the sink.

settings.question: Do I need to be home to receive my meals?
settings.answer: Not at all! Meals are delivered using insulation and gel cold packs that will keep them at refrigerated temperatures for quite a long time! The cold air does dissipate quickly once you open the box, so you should transfer meals to the fridge immediately.

settings.question: How many times a week does HeartyCajun deliver?
settings.answer: Once a week! You can expect your meals to arrive between 8 am to 8 pm. We will contact you before we arrive so that you're always in the loop. Currently we deliver only in the South Florida area, but we are expanding!

settings.question: Do you deliver to my zip–code?
settings.answer: We are quickly expanding and growing thanks to the support of customers like you who enable our product to make a difference in their lives. To find out if we deliver to your delivery area, please enter your Zip Code on the Plans page. If we do not currently deliver to your area then we will notify you as soon as we do!

settings.question: Do you change the meals on your menu?
settings.answer: Yes, every week! We currently add 4-5 new items to our menu each week. So you can try new items or keep your favorites.

settings.question: How do I heat up my meals?
settings.answer:
Our meals are fully cooked to safe internal temperatures which means all you have to do is reheat the meal in the microwave. Please know, heating times can vary depending on your microwave/oven. Our meal trays are microwavable but our covers are not, so remember to uncover your meals before microwaving them.

Note: If you opt to use a standard oven to heat your meals, we recommend using a sheet pan to heat meals so it is easy to get out once hot! (Our meals trays are designed to be heated in a convection (or toaster) oven and/or heated with those settings.

settings.question: What if I’m unhappy with any of my meals?
settings.answer: If you are unhappy with any of your meals, please reach out to us at 754-732-2599.
